page-local-environment-brownie-desc: Usoro mmepe na nnwale dabere na Python maka nkwekọrịta smart na ezubere Igwe Virtual Ethereum.
page-local-environment-kurtosis-desc: Ngwa ọrụ dabere na akpa maka mfe nhazi na ịtụgharị ọtụtụ ndị ahịa testnet Ethereum maka mmepe ngwa ngwa mpaghara dApp, iye oyiyi, na nnwale.
page-local-environment-epirus-desc: Ikpo okwu maka mmepụta, mbugharị na nyochaa ngwa blockchain na igwe mebere Java.
page-local-environment-eth-app-desc: Mepụta ngwa na-akwado Ethereum na otu iwu. Ọ na-abịa na ọtụtụ ihe UI frameworks na ndebiri DeFi na enye ịhọrọ site na ya.
page-local-environment-foundry-desc: Ngwa ọrụ dị ọsọ, na ekpo ọkụ, obere na modul maka mmepe ngwa Ethereum nke edere na Rust.
page-local-environment-framework-feature: Atụmatụ iji tụgharịa ihe atụ mpaghara blockchain.
Ngwa ọrụ iji chịkọta ma nwalee nkwekọrịta smart gị.
Ihe mgbakwunye mmepe ndị ahịa iji wuo ngwa na-eche ihu onye ọrụ n'ime otu ọrụ/ebe nchekwa.
Nhazi iji jikọọ na netwọk Ethereum ma wepụta nkwekọrịta, ma ọ bụ na mpaghara na-agba ọsọ, ma ọ bụ otu netwọk ọha na eze Ethereum.
Nkesa ngwa ewepụghị - njikọta na nhọrọ nchekwa dị ka IPFS.
Usoro ndị a na-abịa n'ọtụtụ ọrụ n'ime igbe ahụ, dị ka:
page-local-environment-frameworks-desc: Anyị na-akwado ịhọrọ usoro, ọkachasị ma ọ bụrụ na ị ka na amalite. Ịmepụta dapp zuru oke chọrọ akụkụ teknụzụ dị iche Iche. Usoro na-agụnye ọtụtụ njirimara achọrọ ma ọ bụ nye usoro ngwa mgbakwunye dị mfe iji họrọ ngwaọrụ masịrị gị.
page-local-environment-hardhat-desc: Hardhat bụ ebe mmepe Ethereum maka ndị ọkachamara.
page-local-environment-openZeppelin-desc: Chekwaa oge mmepe site n'ịchịkọta, nkwalite, nyefee, na imekọrịta na mmekọrịta na smart contracts na CLI anyị.
page-local-environment-scaffold-eth-desc: Ethers + Hardhat + meghachi omume: ihe niile iji malite ịmepụta ngwa enweghị isi nke nkwekọrịta smart contracts kwadoro.
page-local-environment-setup-meta-desc: Ntuziaka maka otu esi ahọrọ nchịkọta ngwanrọ gị maka mmepe Ethereum.
page-local-environment-setup-subtitle: Ọ bụrụ na ị dịla njikere ịmalite iwu ya, oge eruola ịhọrọ nchịkọta gị.
page-local-environment-setup-subtitle-2: Nke a bụ ngwaọrụ na usoro ị nwere ike iji nyere gị aka iwulite ngwa Ethereum gị.
page-local-environment-solidity-template: Ihe nlere GitHub maka ntọlitela mbụ maka nkwekọrịta smart Solidity gị. Gụnyere netwọk mpaghara Hardhat, Waffle maka ule, Ethers maka mmejuputa obere akpa, na ndị ọzọ.
page-local-environment-waffle-desc: Ule lib kacha elu maka smart contracts. Jiri naanị ya ma ọ bụ Scaffold-eth ma ọ bụ Hardhat.
